## Solutions
I solved the machine, but I won't publish a write-up. 

https://www.hackthebox.com/achievement/machine/184261/585

![image](https://github.com/h4md153v63n/CTFs/assets/5091265/5c718dd1-8657-480c-b58f-3cfb678f93d6)

I share alternative solutions, and different approaches links in the below:
+ x



![image](https://github.com/h4md153v63n/CTFs/assets/5091265/f404c6f3-6ab5-4c25-9581-0ab341103a8e)

![image](https://github.com/h4md153v63n/CTFs/assets/5091265/973c9bd3-d600-4da8-8c69-cdce9273ce54)

Remove wite spaces using [CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=Remove_whitespace(true,true,true,true,true,false)&), and send this payload with `__VIEWSTATE` parameter as the request on Repeater like in the following:

![image](https://github.com/h4md153v63n/CTFs/assets/5091265/4a4d5ffc-8d8c-44a4-bccb-46f976552148)

+ **Reverse Shell Generator ---> PowerShell #3 (Base64):** https://www.revshells.com/
  + https://payloads.net/Reverse/
  + https://weibell.github.io/reverse-shell-generator/

## Problems Solution
+ **Run Ysoserial.exe on kali/linux with dotnet48:** https://medium.com/@hypri0n/run-ysoserial-exe-on-kali-linux-47b344ddff27
  + https://github.com/pwntester/ysoserial.net/issues/9
+ **How to install Mono or dotNET45 on Linux:** https://www.dedoimedo.com/computers/wine-dotnet-mono.html
+ **Unable to install wine32:i386:** https://github.com/actions/runner-images/issues/4589
  + https://forums.kali.org/showthread.php?30562-Wine-will-not-work-at-all-in-Kali-Rolling
+ **Kali Linux Wine: Could not load kernel32.dll, status C0000135:** https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/kali-linux-wine-could-not-load-kernel32-dll-status-c0000135-hatasi-nasil-coezueluer.2525858/
  + Try this code: `export WINEPREFIX=~/gamefolder`
+ **How to install Wine on Kali Linux:** https://computingforgeeks.com/how-to-install-wine-on-kali-linux-and-debian-64-bit/
